name: Necromancy
description: Allows resurrection of killed creatures as undead minions that follow and obey the player.

name: necromancy
description: Your skill in the dark arts of necromancy.  Represents knowledge of death magic and undead control.  A higher skill increases the effectiveness of necromantic abilities and allows control of more powerful undead.

name: spellcraft
description: Your skill in the arcane.  Represents magical theory and manipulation of mana.  Higher levels improve spell success.
